title: Generate Acceptance Test Cards in Modal
description: When clicking "Create Acceptance Test" button, 1-3 acceptance test cards are generated in the modal as a list of foam cards, each with separate Given-When-Then text inputs
iWant: to click "Create Acceptance Test" and see 1-3 pre-generated acceptance test cards with Given-When-Then input fields
soThat: I can quickly create structured acceptance tests without starting from scratch
